      • addPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/addPost",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addPost(@RequestParam(value="name",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="info",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String info,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="imageLocation",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String imageLocation,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="webLink",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String webLink,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="linkCaption",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String linkCaption,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="imageCaption",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String imageCaption,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="price",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String price,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="season",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String season,
                                                                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="address",required=true)
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String address)
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of place/ event
        info - the description of said event
        imageLocation - where in the web is the image located
        webLink - the link to the event/place
        linkCaption - caption for link
        imageCaption - caption for image
        price - what price point is this event/place at
        season - when can we attend this event/place
        address - where is this place/ event located at
        Returns:
        a response in which it tells a specific error or if it was valid this will take all params and make it a Resource model and convert to a Detail model and then add it

      • getItems

        @RequestMapping(value="/getItems",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getItems(@RequestParam(value="price",required=true)
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String price,
                                                                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="season",required=true)
                                                                                                                                            java.lang.String season)
        Parameters:
        price - price we want the data from
        season - what season we want the data from
        Returns:
        returns a set of 3 items if successful and a success message, other wise it return a error code with no data

      • post

        @PostMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> post(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                    java.lang.String ID,
                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                    EventResource eventResource)
        Parameters:
        ID - of the event that we upload, it will be override and replaced so doesnt matter what is sent here
        eventResource - the json data of the Event Resource
        Returns:
        a response if add was successful
